Class BasePlateau

java.lang.Object
  com.thoughtworks.robot.space.Plateau
      com.thoughtworks.robot.space.BasePlateau
All Implemented Interfaces:
PlateauManager
public class BasePlateau
extends Plateau

Base implementation of Plateau. This class implements getRobotsByPlateau() and isRobotOverLapping() methods of PlateauManager

Author:
sshinde

Method Detail

getRobotsByPlateau

public java.util.List<Robot> getRobotsByPlateau(java.util.Collection<Robot> robots)
Method which takes Collection of all Robot(s) as an argument and return only those Robot(s) which are planted on this/current Plateau.

Parameters:
robots - Collection of all robots (from all Plateau(s))
Returns:
List List of Robot which are planted on current Plateau
See Also:
Plateau, PlateauManager

isRobotOverLapping

public boolean isRobotOverLapping(java.util.List<Robot> robots,
                                  Robot robot)
This method checks whether robot is overlapping with other Robot(s) on same Plateau. This validation will only be performed when allowRobotOverlap = false.

Parameters:
robots - List of all Robot(s)
robot - Robot for which overlap validation needs to be performed
See Also:
Plateau, PlateauManager
